A

active - Variable in class main.Battle
A Monster variable which points to the monster the user is currently using
activeMonster - Variable in class main.Player
An Monster variable which contains the users Active Monster which is the monster they will fight with
addHealth(int) - Method in class main.Monster
An instance method, used to increase the current health of this monster whilst not exceeding the maximum amount of health this monster can have, takes an int variable amount as its parameter, returns void
addItem(Items) - Method in class main.Player
An instance method, used to add an Items parameter item to the users list of items, returns void
addMonster(Monster) - Method in class main.Player
An instance method, used to add an Monster parameter creep to the users list of Monsters, returns void
attack(Monster) - Method in class main.Monster
An instance method, used in Battle to have a monster attack another monster (other), takes a Monster variable as its parameter, returns void
Attack - Variable in class main.BattleWindow
A JButton which when pressed will have the users active monster attack the leading enemy monster
AttackPotion - Class in main
A subclass of Items this is the attack potion that will increase the monsters attack by 20 and decrease the gold by 15 when bought and increase gold by 10 when sold
AttackPotion() - Constructor for class main.AttackPotion
constructor for the attack potion from the items super class
